title: The New Jewish-Christian Encounter
itunes:title: The New Jewish-Christian Encounter
description: On this episode, Jennifer Rosner joins Mark Bauerlein to discuss her new book, "Healing the Schism: Karl Barth, Franz Rosenzweig, and the New Jewish-Christian Encounter."
